data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Derka, Tomáš, Svitok, Marek, Fedor, Peter (2016): Hydrolutos piaroa sp. n. (Orthoptera: Anostostomatidae), a new semiaquatic Lutosini species from south-western Venezuelan lowland streams. Zootaxa 4066 (4): 485-492, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4066.4.9
